TestData.scenario: Validate Facebook icon is visible in footer
Validate Facebook link redirects to correct company page
Validate Facebook page loads successfully
Validate company profile picture is displayed on Facebook page
Validate company name is displayed on Facebook page header
Validate Like button is visible on Facebook page
Validate Facebook page contains About section
Validate Facebook page contains Contact info
Validate Facebook page contains Posts section
Validate Facebook page contains Photos section
Validate Facebook page contains Videos section
Validate Facebook page contains Community section
Validate Facebook page contains Events section
Validate Facebook page contains Reviews section

Validate Facebook page contains correct number of followers
Validate Facebook page loads within 5 seconds
Validate Facebook page does not show 404 or error message
Validate Facebook link opens in new tab
Validate Facebook link is not broken
Validate Facebook icon has correct aria-label
Validate Facebook icon has alt text
Validate Facebook icon is clickable
Validate Facebook icon color matches brand
Validate Facebook icon size is 24x24px
Validate Facebook link is present in sitemap
Validate Facebook link is present in mobile view
Validate Facebook link is present in desktop view
Validate Facebook link is present in tablet view
Validate Facebook link is not duplicated in footer
Validate Facebook link is not present in header
Validate Facebook link is not present in body
Validate Facebook link is HTTPS
Validate Facebook page About section contains company description
Validate Facebook page Contact info contains email
Validate Facebook page Contact info contains phone
Validate Facebook page has at least one post
Validate Facebook page has at least one photo
Validate Facebook page has at least one video
Validate Facebook page has at least one review
Validate Facebook page has at least one event
Validate Facebook page has correct page category
Validate Facebook page is public
Validate Facebook page is not restricted
Validate Facebook page is not under review

Validate Facebook page is not blocked
Validate Facebook page is not suspended
Validate Facebook page does not prompt for login

Validate Facebook page loads on mobile browser
